attributes.action: Any MP elected wishing to defect to stand down.
attributes.additional_details: Too many mps defect to whatever suits them, stuff the electorate that voted them in... Fraudulent behaviour..
attributes.background: Any MP wishing to defect, should immediately stand down and lose all parliamentary privileges.. .. With a by-election being called, then said mp stands for the party they wish to  stand for..  Surely if they do not its Fraudulent to get in on one ticket then to defect to another party..
